title: Michael Sziedat
text:
Michael Sziedat (born 22 August 1952) is a former <a href="Germany">German</a> <a href="Association%20football">football</a> player.
Sziedat played 379 times for <a href="Hertha%20BSC">Hertha BSC</a> and <a href="Eintracht%20Frankfurt">Eintracht Frankfurt</a> in the <a href="Bundesliga">Bundesliga</a>, netting 16 goals. His 280 Bundesliga caps for Berlin are still a club record. In <a href="1971%E2%80%9372%20Bundesliga">1971</a> he started his pro career at Hertha and left them after being relegated in <a href="1979%E2%80%9380%20Bundesliga">1980</a> to play for the "Eagles" in Frankfurt.
Honours.
Club.
Eintracht Frankfurt
Hertha BSC
